name: Pumpkin Rush (Pomy)
description:
Best Played with full screen (no tabs, no sidebar)

There are 3 different game modes to unlock:

Normal(1 minute)

Hard(30 seconds)

Insane(20 seconds)

There are also hidden golden pumpkins to collect as well as secret passages to skip areas with.

This is the 3rd game jam I've been in so comment any bugs/improvements
